page.title: 18Bondleigh Newcomers to area
page.content: {Why we came to Bondleigh } Family of 3, arrived in Bondleigh l981 following husbands London company receivership. Mid-Devon chosen for generally lower cost of houses, existence of relatives in area; and cottage at Bondleigh for its location, price, potential for improvement. {What we purchased} Reputed to be 300 yrs.old consist of 2 small cottages built of cob and thatch only 1 cottage habitable. Improvements made for our well being, conscious of need of preservation of old buildings for benefit of posterity. {Cost of house improvements in Â£000. } Structure, Elec.
